parameters.name: permset_d
parameters.description: The permissions set that you want to check.

parameters.name: perm
parameters.description: The permission you want to test.

return_values.description: The permission is present in the permissions set.
The permission isn't present in the permissions set.

full_content:
Function: acl_get_perm_np
URL: https://www.qnx.com/developers/docs/7.1/com.qnx.doc.neutrino.lib_ref/topic/a/acl_get_perm_np.html
Synopsis: int acl_get_perm_np( acl_permset_t const permset_d,
Headers: #include <sys/acl.h>
Parameters:
  - permset_d: The permissions set that you want to check.
  - perm: The permission you want to test.
Return Values:
  - 1: The permission is present in the permissions set.
  - 0: The permission isn't present in the permissions set.
  - -1: An error occurred
  (errno
  is set).
Examples:
Example 1:
#include <sys/acl.h>

int acl_get_perm_np( acl_permset_t const permset_d,
                     acl_perm_t const perm );
